example.eg: The teacher's hint helped the child guess the answer.
example.egtrans: 老师的提示帮助那孩子猜出了答案。

example.eg: Your gift will be blue, he hinted.
example.egtrans: 他透露说，你的礼物会是蓝色的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 示意, 透露, 透露

example.eg: Roger Daltrey hinted at the possibility of a new Who album.
example.egtrans: 罗杰·多特里暗示“谁人乐队”可能会发行新的唱片。

example.eg: There was a hint in Sam's eyes that he knew what I meant.
example.egtrans: 山姆的眼睛示意我他知道我的意思。

example.eg: There was a hint of cinnamon in the apple pie.
example.egtrans: 苹果派里放了一点点肉桂。

dsense.name: give me a hint, give me a clue
dsense.guideword: (provide a clue to help me guess)

example.eg: Who's your mystery boyfriend? Go on, give me a hint ...
There was not a hint of any sugar in that sour pie.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有任何迹象, 没有任何征兆
